医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的预测模型有助于识别中风后癫痫风险由阿姆斯特丹 UMC 领导的来自 15 个国家的研究人员开发了一种方法来预测哪些患者在脑静脉窦血栓 (CVT) 后有癫痫风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/New-prediction-model-helps-identify-epilepsy-risk-after-中风.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/New-prediction-model-helps-identify-epilepsy-risk-after-中风.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cbb7092a-9b54-49bb-b9d7-dde0f0ce5f2e Mon, 21 Oct 2024 14:07:07 -0400 New prediction model helps identify epilepsy risk after stroke
新的气味技术可能为医疗诊断打开大门尽管气味在历史上在对抗鼠疫和结核病等疾病方面发挥了重要作用，但人类的鼻子通常不够灵敏，无法用作可靠的诊断工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/New-smell-technology-may-open-doors-for-medical-diagnostics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/New-smell-technology-may-open-doors-for-medical-diagnostics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dfff440b-67c5-4bab-bc0a-9569aaa6ca7f Mon, 21 Oct 2024 13:54:04 -0400 New smell technology may open doors for medical diagnostics
研究揭示恐惧记忆处理背后的机制一项将于 2024 年 10 月 21 日发表在《自然通讯》上的创新研究揭示了恐惧记忆的两种看似矛盾的效应背后的机制：无法忘记但难以回忆。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Study-reveals-mechanism-behind-fear-memory-processing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Study-reveals-mechanism-behind-fear-memory-processing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22dc87d1-aae6-4730-98db-3c6aa7fb0fcc Mon, 21 Oct 2024 13:34:13 -0400 Study reveals mechanism behind fear memory processing
与其他慢性病相比，心理健康问题会导致更大的生产力损失根据东芬兰大学、芬兰社会保险机构 (Kela) 和莫纳什大学最近的一项联合研究，抑郁症和其他心理健康问题比肌肉骨骼疾病或心血管疾病更能减少生产力调整生命年 (PALY)澳大利亚大学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Mental-health-problems-lead-to-greater-productivity-loss-than-other-chronic-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Mental-health-problems-lead-to-greater-productivity-loss-than-other-chronic-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a0783a84-bab0-44da-8b3e-8e4729c123fc Mon, 21 Oct 2024 13:26:55 -0400 Mental health problems lead to greater productivity loss than other chronic conditions
EURESTOP 网络旨在解决抗生素耐药性危机有令人信服的证据表明细菌、寄生虫、病毒和真菌正在对抗菌药物产生耐药性。因此，人类、动物和植物的感染变得越来越难以治疗，在某些情况下甚至不可能治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/EURESTOP-network-aims-to-tackle-antibiotic-resistance-crisis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/EURESTOP-network-aims-to-tackle-antibiotic-resistance-crisis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99dba8d5-e750-4cfa-809e-c2329ef2f3d3 Mon, 21 Oct 2024 13:19:46 -0400 EURESTOP network aims to tackle antibiotic resistance crisis
长期抗病毒治疗可以保护视力免受带状疱疹的影响宾夕法尼亚大学佩雷​​尔曼医学院和纽约大学格罗斯曼医学院的教师领导的一项新研究表明，服用一年抗病毒药物可以预防与影响眼睛的带状疱疹相关的视力损伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Long-term-antiviral-treatment-may-protect-vision-from-shingles.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Long-term-antiviral-treatment-may-protect-vision-from-shingles.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=510a72df-d851-4e81-9f7c-c8a9f02be8d3 Mon, 21 Oct 2024 13:07:35 -0400 Long-term antiviral treatment may protect vision from shingles
遗传变异被确定为严重溃疡性结肠炎的潜在预测因子HLA-DRB1*01:03 遗传变异与严重溃疡性结肠炎相关，显着增加重大手术和住院治疗的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Genetic-variant-identified-as-pottial-predictor-for-severe-ulcerative-colitis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Genetic-variant-identified-as-pottial-predictor-for-severe-ulcerative-colitis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=06120103-eb93-4e27-a5b3-d52feabf0d08 Mon, 21 Oct 2024 12:58:00 -0400 Genetic variant identified as potential predictor for severe ulcerative colitis
网上食品购物：您获得所需的信息了吗？一项研究强调美国在线杂货网站上的营养标签供应不足，呼吁加强公共卫生监管措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Online-food-shopping-Are-you-getting-the-information-you-need.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Online-food-shopping-Are-you-getting-the-information-you-need.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d10b1cf-52d4-4722-a164-9dc76556bf04 Mon, 21 Oct 2024 12:24:00 -0400 Online food shopping: Are you getting the information you need?
揭示血癌中 B 细胞成熟的机制根据西班牙癌症登记网络 (REDECAN) 的最新预测，明年西班牙将有 400 多人被诊断出患有 B 细胞急性淋巴细胞白血病 (B-ALL)，其中 80% 是 14 岁以下儿童）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Unraveling-the-mechanisms-of-B-cell-maturation-in-blood-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/Unraveling-the-mechanisms-of-B-cell-maturation-in-blood-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=418d7523-a38f-464d-a007-92cfb3d7b49e Mon, 21 Oct 2024 09:52:10 -0400 Unraveling the mechanisms of B-cell maturation in blood cancer
新指南重点关注通过健康生活预防首次中风健康的生活方式，例如良好的营养、戒烟和锻炼身体，以及常规健康检查和通过药物控制心血管疾病和中风的危险因素，可以帮助预防个人首次中风。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/New-guidelines-focus-on-preventing-first-中风-through-healthy-living.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241021/New-guidelines-focus-on-preventing-first-中风-through-healthy-living.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e063904a-5d3e-460a-9791-197ef4a4b079 Mon, 21 Oct 2024 09:46:45 -0400 New guidelines focus on preventing first strokes through healthy living
